name: Super Duper Space Mining Simulator
description:
*This game has been made for Jamulator 2021 GameJam*

***UI ISSUES WILL BE FIXED SOON***

THE TIME HAS COME.THE ULTIMATE SPACE MINING SIMULATOR IS RELASED! 

The aim of the game is to take the desired amount of metal onto space without heating the ship,without running out of water and fuel,your spaceship before it breaks down by space monsters and by accelerating and slowing down your ship at the right time,not chrashing into the astreoids.

The game aims to provide the player with an unprecedented "Space simulation". 

Controls:

A and left arrow key:Rotate left.

D and right arrow key:Rotate Right.

W and up arrow key:Go forward.

S and down arrow key:Go backward.

X key:Shoot laser.

All Visuals created by piskel web site.

All Voice effects(shooting,item colletct,etc) randomly generated by GMXR 1-0-2 voice effect program.
